Name: Night Racer
About the game: Get ready to experience racing like never before. Use your epic driving skills and use all the powerups to cross first in the finish line. Compete in 4 different game modes Multiplayer, Championship, Arcade and Time Trial. Cross-Platform Multiplayer Support Compete against others on the Leaderboards Cars, Cars, Cars... Over 8 different cars to choose from, ranging from Sports cars to Vintage cars. Customize your cars with new Skins, Toppers and Boosters. Collect coins to upgrade your cars to be the best they can be. Vroom Vroom Vroom... 9 different tracks, each have their own sets of obstacles and challenges for you to overcome and emerge victorious. 8 Different Championships to playthrough Play through all the levels in arcade mode and time trial While you're racing watch out for the opponents who like to go rogue and push you off the edges of the track. ABOUT US Smash Game Studios is an Indie Game company focused on creating compelling experience for Mobile, PC and New Emerging Platforms. We're best known for our games The Last Train.
